Original:
開了9年的品酒好店
一條長桌，當天坐了接近25人
老闆是為溫和又能聊的叔叔
當晚大家都依自己喜好口感請他推薦
果然都很對味
特別喜歡東京白啤的清爽，想起東京遊的新鮮感
金啤則是不帶苦味，果香感舒適
水果類的啤酒也都很鮮明好入口(草莓、芒果)
當天兩桌客人偶爾混在一起聊天
chill的氛圍說明了整體完美的空間感
整面的啤酒牆像是酒界的軍火庫
偶爾配上老闆啤酒的深知識
很推薦三五好友來個小酌之夜~~
EN:
I have opened a good shop for 9 years
A long table, nearly 25 people were sitting on the same day
The boss is a gentle and talked uncle
That night, everyone asked him to recommend it according to his preferences
It's really right
I especially like the refreshing Tokyo white beer, remembering the freshness of Tokyo tour
Golden Beer is not bitter, and the fruit aroma is comfortable
Fruit beer is also very clear and good entrance (strawberry, mango)
Two tables of guests occasionally mixed together to chat on that day
Chill's atmosphere illustrates the perfect sense of space as a whole
The whole beer wall of the whole side is like the arms of the wine industry
Occasionally with the deep knowledge of the boss beer
I recommend three or five friends to have a drink night ~~
